text: How do I set up a basic website with registration in Python on Dreamhost?
I need to write a basic website on Dreamhost.
It needs to be done in Python.
I discovered Dreamhost permits me to write .py files, and read them.
So now I am looking for a basic framework, or a set of files that has already programmed the whole registration to be able to kick-off the project in a simple way.
By registration I mean the files to register a new account, log in, check the email (sending a mail), and edit the user information.
